Description:
Ballistics of the 57×480 mmR UBR-271, UBR-271K, UBR-271SP shots fired from anti-tank gun ZiS-2, tank gun ZiS-4 and Ch-51(M).

Shot       Projectile  Mass  M.V.  Type         Filler      Introudced
                       kg    m/s
UBR-271    BR-271      3.14  990   APHE(BC)-T   14g A-IX-2  Wartime
UBR-271K   BR-271K     3.14  990   APHE(CBC)-T  18g A-IX-2  Post-war (1946-1955)
UBR-271SP  BR-271SP    3.14  990   AP-T         Solid       Wartime
UBR-271M   BR-271M     2.8   1020  APHE(CBC)-T  13g A-IX-2  Post-war

Charge Mass:       1.5 kg 12/7 or 14/7 Pyroxylin
Breech Pressure:  3100 kgf/cm² (copper-crusher gauge, 340.2 MPa)
Velocity:      990/975 m/s from ZiS-2/Ch-51 tables.
Chamber Volume:    2.0 L (est)
Chambrage:        1.62 
Travel:           3566 mm
